components.title: Arista MLS DCS-7000 Series L2S
components.description: Arista MLS DCS-7000 Series L2S based on DOD SRG/STIG.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ac-4.

implemented-requirements.description: The Arista Multilayer Switch must enforce approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information between interconnected systems based on organization-defined information flow control policies.
The Arista Multilayer Switch must enforce approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information within the network based on organization-defined information flow control policies.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ia-3.

implemented-requirements.description: The Arista Multilayer Switch must authenticate 802.1X connected devices before establishing any connection.
The Arista Multilayer Switch must uniquely identify all network-connected endpoint devices before establishing any connection.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ia-3.1.

implemented-requirements.description:
The Arista Multilayer Switch must authenticate all endpoint devices before establishing a network connection using bidirectional authentication that is cryptographically based.
The Arista Multilayer Switch must re-authenticate all endpoint devices every 60 minutes or less.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ia-11.

implemented-requirements.description: The Arista Multilayer Switch must re-authenticate 802.1X connected devices every hour.
